frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file that defines OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, setting the page title to 'Yameen Truck Body Maker' and mounting the React root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles the full single-page layout by composing Navigation, HeroSection, AboutSection, ServicesSection, ContactSection, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About Us section describing Yameen Truck Body Maker's expertise and values, featuring a two-column layout with descriptive text, a bullet list of key values, and a 4-card highlights grid.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with four info cards (phone '9719774964', email 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com', address, hours) and a validated 4-field contact form with success state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Full-width footer with brand identity, quick-links, services list, and contact info displaying real phone '9719774964' and email 'mursaleensaifi14@gmail.com', plus a copyright bar.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background image, overlays, company name heading, tagline, two CTA buttons, an animated stats row, and a scroll-down indicator.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive fixed navigation bar for the Yameen Truck Body Maker site with smooth-scroll links, scroll-based background change, and a mobile hamburger menu.
Displays a grid of six truck body services (fabrication, repair, painting, fleet, steel/aluminum, hydraulics) with icons, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, switching between anonymous and authenticated actors based on the current Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Barlow fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for the industrial dark theme with amber accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the App component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with Barlow fonts, oklch-based CSS variable color tokens, and a custom industrial steel color palette alongside amber accents.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state and versioning for the Yameen Truck Body Maker website, listing all existing features, requirements, and architectural notes across multiple build iterations.
